sentences.en: Also the oxide itself is a moderately effective lubricant.
sentences.cn: 它的氧化物也是中等效能的润滑剂.

sentences.en: Atoms of iron in the nail combine with atoms of oxygen from the air to form molecules of iron oxide, or rust.
sentences.cn: 钉子里的铁原子与空气中的氧原子结合后形成氧化铁分子，也就是锈。

sentences.en: If the oxide film is hard, sliding occurs on the outside thereof.
sentences.cn: 如果氧化膜较硬, 则滑动在它们的外面发生.

sentences.en: Iron oxide may be utilized in achieving propellants of ultrahigh burn rate.
sentences.cn: 氧化铁可用以制出超高燃速的推进剂.

sentences.en: Occasionally red lead is added to the leady oxide.
sentences.cn: 有时将铅丹加到铅粉中.

sentences.en: Oxide is usually seen in our daily life.
sentences.cn: 在我们的日常生活中氧化物很常见.

sentences.en: The detector tube is filled with nitric oxide.
sentences.cn: 检测管中充满了氧化氮.

sentences.en: The fibre diameter increases with increasing fluidity of the molten oxide.
sentences.cn: 熔融氧化物的流化度增大,纤维直径增大.

sentences.en: The nitride on oxide layers remains intact.
sentences.cn: 氧化物表层上面的氮化物保持原状不动.

sentences.en: The storage of lead oxide can be done in individual metal drums.
sentences.cn: 铅氧粉可以放在单独的金属筒内储存.

sentences.en: The technology for thin oxide growth is still emerging with a variety of techniques being used.
sentences.cn: 薄层氧化物生长工艺仍在产生一系列可供采用的技术.

sentences.en: This oxide coating may peel off under stress and break the stack bond.
sentences.cn: 该氧化层受压可能会剥落,并破坏铁芯的联结.

sentences.en: Under the influence of nitrous oxide , he found himself writing such impressively nonsensical propositions.
sentences.cn: 在笑气影响下, 他写下了这样惹人注意的无聊话.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 金属氧化物；金属氧化物电阻；金属绝缘膜
[化]一氧化二氮；笑气（等于laughing gas）

trans.tran_en: a substance which is produced when a substance is combined with oxygen
